required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy With Camrelizumab in Locally Advanced Esophageal Squamous Cell
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Single Arm, Single Center, Phase II Clinical Trial of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy With Camrelizumab in Locally Advanced Esophageal Squamous Cell

brief_summary.textblock: A prospective, single arm, single center, phase II clinical trial of neoadjuvant chemotherapy with camrelizumab in locally advanced esophageal squamous cell,to evaluate the progression free survival

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the first cycle of treatment (day one) to two month after the last cycle (each cycle is 21 days)

arm_group.description: paclitaxel and cisplatin Carilizumab 200 mg, every 3 weeks, 2 cycles. Paclitaxel 175 mg / m2, D1, every 3 weeks, 2 cycles Cisplatin 75mg / m2 D1, conventional hydration for 3 days, every 3 weeks, 2 cycles

intervention.description: Carilizumab 200 mg, every 3 weeks, 2 cycles.Paclitaxel 175 mg / m2, D1, every 3 weeks, 2 cycles
Cisplatin 75mg / m2 D1, conventional hydration for 3 days, every 3 weeks, 2 cycles
